author: Special Correspondent
text: Ex-service personnel should avail themselves of the schemes implemented for their welfare and come forward to start business ventures, Collector K.S.Palanisamy said here on Thursday. Inaugurating a skill development training and seminar on entrepreneurship organised for the benefit of ex-service personnel at the office of the District Ex-servicemen Welfare here, he said first generation entrepreneurs could avail credit of up to Rs.1 crore with 25 per cent subsidy for starting ventures. He distributed welfare assistance worth Rs.85,000 to ex-service personnel and their dependents on the occasion.
title: Skill training for ex-servicemen
